text: 4.5: Ro 2.1; 2.29; 1 Ko 3.8; 2 Ko 5.10; VB 20.12Fhe Bakɨme nza khar mbui tɨvi ga suaŋv nza suanga tuk ntigar. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nde fhumra harigi gumgi mbui tɨvi ga suaŋv mbe suaŋ thari. Nde Guma Bakɨme rargɨri, ana zirɨrga. Ana mba zorga gɨngɨnan ki bigi, ana nta ndiv kɨrar vhava ŋaara khɨngirga. Ana za mba gumgir ndɨkndɨgi ndiv kɨra khɨngirga. Mba tugen nza bevbevira, Fhe Bakɨme nza muuŋgi ŋaari ga suaŋv nzan ndikndigirga.
